name: Simple ODK
description: Simple ODK server for receiving form submissions from ODK Collect and saving to an external storage provider

FORM_STORE.description: The storage backend to use for form submissions, one of `github`, `gist`, or `firebase`

S3_BUCKET.description: S3 Bucket for storing any media attached to forms - required if you attach media

S3_KEY.description: S3 Access Key ID, required if you want to save media

S3_SECRET.description: S3 Secret Access Key, required if you want to save media
